headline: CBRE Group (CBRE): Is the Stock Undervalued After a Strong 18% Annual Return?
summary: CBRE Group (CBRE) shares have delivered a steady return for investors over the past year, rising nearly 18%. The company's performance continues to offer a useful lens into broader real estate market trends. See our latest analysis for CBRE Group. CBRE Group's upbeat momentum continued, with the share price notching an 18.3% gain year-to-date and a total shareholder return of nearly 18% over the past year. Short-term dips have done little to slow its long-haul performance. This remains...
